text: Vasishta Nadi, named after the Hindu sage Vasishtha. It originates (starts) from Salem district. This river flows in Tiruchirapalli and joins Sweata Nadi before flowing into the Bay of Bengal. Dams on the river are located at Attur and Periyeri.There are 12 Siva temples located on villages through which this river flows. ==References== Category:Rivers of Tamil Nadu
title: Vashista River
